oai_dc:dc.dc:title: al- Kashf ʻan mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf : manuscript, 1584
Risālat al-Kashf ʻan mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Suyūṭī , 1445-1505
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cream laid paper. 20 x 13 cm. (15.8 x 8.3 cm.).
According to colophon, copy completed in the hand of Aḥmad ibn Ḥasan in 992 [1584].
Bound with: Baḥr al-kalām fī ʻilm al-tawḥīd / lil-Shaykh al-Imām Abū al-Muʻīn al-Nasafī (ff. 1v-25r).
MS Arab 283. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic eschatology
